data.title: People — Ballet Fantastique
data.text:
KEY VOLUNTEERS

Ballet Fantastique would not exist without the contribution of hundreds of hours of volunteer service from dozens of individuals every month. Also every month, we have a handful of volunteers who go above and beyond, who floor us with their generous investment in Ballet Fantastique. We recognize the following volunteers for their exceptional, ongoing service.

Dianna Pounder / Academy Billing Specialist (2006-present)

Monica Piper / Front of House

Tessa Richards / Theater PT

PRODUCTION + CREATIVE DESIGN TEAM

Genevieve & Deborah Speer / Creative Assistant to the Producers, Libretto Support

Gerry Rempel / Resident Composer, Arranger + Regular Music Director

Adam Goldthwaite / Sculptor, Properties and Sets Design, Special Effects

Deborah Peña / Set Design, Painting, Special Effects

And many, many others

COSTUMES + WARDROBE DESIGN TEAM

Donna Marisa Bontrager / Design

Chelsea Lovejoy / Resident Maker, Wardrobe Supervisor

Allison Ditson, Allihalla / Design, Construction

Gabriel Ritzmann Sarmento / Headpiece Construction

Mitra DeMirza Gruwell / Headpiece Construction

And many, many others
